Description.Text: Situated in the historic Park area of the city of Nottingham, Walton's Hotel provides the perfect retreat. Built as a hunting lodge in the early 1800's, this unique residence has retained many of its original features whilst offering all of the conveniences of modern living. This prestigious and secluded location is amazingly just 5 minutes walk from the vibrant cent-re of Nottingham. Here you'll find a superb range of shops, bars, pubs, restaurants, theaters and the city's historic castle. Beautifully decorated throughout, Walton's Hotel offers 17 stunning single, double and family rooms all with free WIFI, a lively bar and stylish restaurant serving a delicious menu. You can also relax in the spacious patio area overlooking a tranquil landscaped garden. Walton's Hotel is the perfect setting for private parties and weddings, all tailor-made to meet your requirements. Or you can simply sit back and enjoy one of regular special events such as summer barbecues and evenings of live music. Amenities - Free Breakfast.
